definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: Seahorses like to live in shallow waters amongst the seaweed and eelgrass.
sentences.chinese: 海马喜欢住在海藻或鳗草丛中的浅海。

sentences.english: Organic forms of amnesia are usually associated with dysfunction of the DIENCEPHALON or HIPPOCAMPUS. (From Adams et al.
sentences.chinese: 遗忘症的器质形式通常与间脑或海马的功能障碍有关。

sentences.english: Did you know? Seahorses have no teeth and no stomach.
As part of normal aging, the hippocampus shrinks.
sentences.chinese: 正常衰老的同时，海马体也会收缩。

sentences.english: The hippocampus also shrivelled faster in smokers.
sentences.chinese: 海马体也会因吸烟而更快的“瘪”掉。

sentences.english: Results To describe the shape of hippocampal formation from sections.
sentences.chinese: 结果从切片上描述海马结构的形态。

sentences.english: This effect could even be seen in the hippocampi of aged mice.
sentences.chinese: 这种作用甚至可以在老年小鼠的海马中看到。

sentences.english: Focal ischemia also could raise the neurogenesis in hippocampus dentate gyrus .
sentences.chinese: 局灶性脑缺血后亦可增加海马齿状回内神经发生。

sentences.english: Some of the changes took place in the hippocampi.
sentences.chinese: 这些变化也包括海马体的变化。

sentences.english: Emphasis on human and animal models of hippocampal mechanisms and function.
sentences.chinese: 着重于海马回机制与功能的人类与动物模型。

sentences.english: The dwarf seahorses, or Hippocampus zosterae, are particularly ill-suited to escape.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是侏儒海马或绣眼海马不会逃脱灾害。

sentences.english: The dwarf seahorses, or Hippocampus zosterae, are particularly ill-suited to escape.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是侏儒海马或绣眼海马不会逃脱灾害。

sentences.english: Neure density in cerebral cortex and hippocampi was analyzed with pathological graphics context analysis system.
sentences.chinese: 病理图文分析系统检测大脑皮质及海马神经元密度。

sentences.english: It observed the effects of treadmill running and cerebral ischemia on hippocampus neurogenesis of adult rats.
sentences.chinese: 观察跑台运动和脑缺血对海马神经再生的影响。

sentences.english: Rhodium-plated seahorse brooch in Waikiki Blue crystal.
sentences.chinese: 镀白金色海马胸针镶有蓝色水晶。

sentences.english: And the one storage site where they begin is a structure called the hippocampus.
sentences.chinese: 记忆开始的存储区是一个叫做海马的结构组织。

definition: the young (unborn or newborn) of an animal/larva
capercaillie (Lagopus, several species)/thunderbird (in native American mythology)
